data.introduce: 向代理人提供结算报表查询功能，该接口支持BSP、本票、BOP等多种票证类型结算数据查询。
data.business: 向代理人提供结算报表查询功能。
data.functions:
该接口向代理人提供结算报表查询功能，支持
1、多票种：支持BSP、本票、BOP、CDS、GP等多种票证类型结算数据查询。
2、多指令：支持原黑屏指令TSL（查看当日结算报表）、TPR（查看过期结算报表）。同时支持指定票状态、结算情况等。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TicketingDate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"查询过期报表时间，如2025-08-19","children":[]},{"name":"office","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码）：如：PEK099","children":[]},{"name":"deviceNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"打票机编号","children":[]},{"name":"ticketType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票证类型：例如：CDS,AL,GP,BSP,BOP 默认：BSP","children":[]},{"name":"saleStatusCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票类型：票类型:ISSU(出票)、EXCH(换开)、RFND(退票)、VOID(废票)，可为空，空为查以上全部4种票类型","children":[]},{"name":"value","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"取值：标识:1:成功票;2:失败票;3:全部(成功票+失败票)","children":[]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"airSalesReportUnifiedResponse","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"tslDetails","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"报表信息","children":[{"name":"agent","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"出票AGENT号","children":[]},{"name":"airline","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"航司","children":[]},{"name":"collection","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"结算票款","children":[]},{"name":"commissionAmount","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"代理费金额","children":[]},{"name":"commissionMode","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"代理费标识","children":[]},{"name":"commissionPercent","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"代理费率","children":[]},{"name":"conjunction","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"联票顺序序号","children":[]},{"name":"currency","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"币别","children":[]},{"name":"deviceNum","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"销售打票机编号","children":[]},{"name":"etCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"退票-ET电子客票标识","children":[]},{"name":"origin","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"起始地代码（机场或城市）","children":[]},{"name":"paymentTypeCode","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"付款方式","children":[]},{"name":"pnr","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"旅客订座记录简称","children":[]},{"name":"salesDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"销售日期时间","children":[]},{"name":"saleStatusCode","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"销售状态","children":[]},{"name":"ticketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"票号：格式：nnn-nnnnnnnnnn","children":[]},{"name":"ticketType","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"客票类型：1=国际Airline； 2=国际BSP； 3=国内Airline；4=国内BSP","children":[]},{"name":"totalAmount","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"票面总价","children":[]},{"name":"destination","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"目的地代码（机场或城市）","children":[]},{"name":"beginNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"票号起始号码","children":[]},{"name":"endNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"票号结束号码","children":[]},{"name":"bookedCount","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"预订人数","children":[]},{"name":"groupCount","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"团队人数","children":[]},{"name":"refundFormNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"退票单号","children":[]},{"name":"bookingAgent","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"PNR创建操作员Agent号","children":[]},{"name":"otherDeduction","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"退票-其他扣款","children":[]},{"name":"passengerType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"旅客类型","children":[]},{"name":"obFee","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"OB费","children":[]},{"name":"taxInfoDetailList","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"amount","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"金额","children":[]},{"name":"code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"orignalDetail","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"infantet","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"是否为婴儿","children":[]},{"name":"orignalTKTDetailList","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"ticketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]},{"name":"couponNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票联号","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"tslHeader","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"airline","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航空公司","children":[]},{"name":"deviceNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"打票机编号","children":[]},{"name":"iataNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"iata号","children":[]},{"name":"office","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"office号","children":[]},{"name":"pid","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"主机pid号","children":[]},{"name":"ticketingDate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"出票日期","children":[]},{"name":"salesDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"销售日期时间","children":[]}]},{"name":"errorResponse","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误码","children":[]},{"name":"name","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误名称","children":[]},{"name":"msg","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误英文描述","children":[]},{"name":"msgZH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误中文描述","children":[]},{"name":"trace","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息","children":[]}]}]}]
